trait.name: vision
trait.visualizeProcedure: let this-xcor xcor let this-ycor ycor let this-vision vision let this-heading heading hatch 1 [ set breed sense-cones set size this-vision set shape "vision cone" fd .5 create-link-from myself [tie] ]

condition.name: any-in-sight?
condition.test: report any? other turtles in-cone vision 120 with [breed = breed-type ]

behavior.name: move
behavior.commands: right (random-float 30 * 0.05 / speed-factor) left (random-float 30 * 0.05 / speed-factor) fd 2 * speed-factor

behavior.name: flee

agentInput.name: predator
agentInput.tooltip: Who do they run away from?

behavior.commands: let candidate-predators other predator in-cone vision 120 if any? predator in-cone vision 120 [ let my-predator min-one-of candidate-predators [distance myself] set heading 180 + towards my-predator] fd 1

behavior.name: eat
behavior.commands: ifelse is-agentset? prey1 [ if any? other turtles-here with [breed = prey1] [ let food one-of turtles-here with [breed = prey1] ask food [if any? out-link-neighbors [ask out-link-neighbors [die]] die] set energy energy + 10 ] ] [ if prey1 != nobody and not empty? prey1 [ let food turtle item 0 prey1 face food fd .5 * speed-factor if distance food < 1 [ ask food [if any? out-link-neighbors [ask out-link-neighbors [die]] die] set energy energy + 10 ] ] ]

behavior.name: have-babies
behavior.commands: ask one-of breedname with-max [energy] [ ;set energy (energy / 2) ifelse count out-link-neighbors > 0 [ hatch 1 [rt random 180 fd 5 mutate set-sense-cone1]] [hatch 1 [rt random 180 fd 5 mutate]]

miscProcedure.procedureCode: if breed = breed-type [ if random-float 100 < mutation-probability [ ifelse random-float 100 < 50 [set vision (vision + 1 )] [set vision (vision - 1 )] if vision < 0 [set vision 0] if vision > 10 [set vision 10] ] ]
